text:
"Kita harus mencarinya"
"Kakak di rumah saja dengan [redacted_name] ya? biar [redacted_name] sama yang lain mencari [redacted_name]"
"Tapi.....tolong pastikan adik ku baikÂ² saja" Pintanya
"Tenang saja kak, [redacted_name] juga adik aku" [redacted_name] mengelus bahu sang kakak
"Maafkan aku"
"Untuk apa?"
"Aku tidak bisa berjalan dan itu semua mempersulit mu" [redacted_name] menunduk
"Tidak kak! kakak sama sekali tak merepotkan siapapun"
"Dan tolong jangan ucapkan kata itu lagi" Lirih [redacted_name] yang hanya di balas anggukan kecil oleh [redacted_name]
...
"Ya ampun [redacted_name]" [redacted_name] dengan sekuat tenaga mencoba untuk mendorong kursi rodanya agar ia bisa melihat kondisi adiknya dengan jelas
"Kakkk..." [redacted_name] berjalan dengan tertatih tatih ke arah [redacted_name]
"Kenapa ini bisa terjadi?" [redacted_name] memeluk [redacted_name]
"Kakkk...maafkan aku"
"Sudah, lebih baik kau bersihkan dirimu dulu ya" [redacted_name] mengusap lembut bahu sang adik
Malam ini mereka makan dengan hening, tak ada seorang pun dari mereka yang berani berbicara karena keadaan yang [redacted_name] alami barusan
"Kak...maafin [redacted_name]"
"Ini sudah terjadi" [redacted_name] melirik [redacted_name] lalu segera meraih tangan gadis itu untuk ia genggam
"Kakak gak marah karena hal ini, tapi kakak mohon kamu jangan mau di ajak ke tempat itu lagi" Lirih [redacted_name]
"Kakk....aku di paksa sama mereka" [redacted_name] menunduk dalam
"Kakak akan memindahkan sekolah kamu" Ucap [redacted_name] dengan tegas
trans:
"We have find her"
"Stay at home with [redacted_name], Sister, okay? Let [redacted_name] with other find [redacted_name]"
"But... please make sure my sister is fine," She asked.
"Everything will be okay, [redacted_name] is my sister too" [redacted_name] pats the sister.
"I'm sorry"
"For what?"
"I can't walk and it makes you harder" [redacted_name] she bowed her head.
"No Sis! You don't even bother everyone"
"And please don't say those words again" [redacted_name] said gently, [redacted_name] only answered with nodding.
...
"Oh my God [redacted_name]" [redacted_name] gives all her energy to push the wheelchair to see her sister's condition.
"Sis..." [redacted_name] walks unsteadily towards [redacted_name]
"Why did it happen?" [redacted_name] hugs [redacted_name]
"Sis...I'm sorry."
"It's okay, clean yourself, first" [redacted_name] rubs her sister's shoulder gently.
They have a quiet dinner tonight, no one dares to open their mouth because of what happened to [redacted_name] a moment before.
"Sis... I'm sorry [redacted_name]"
"It's done" [redacted_name] glimpses her eyes to [redacted_name] and holds that girl's arms, immediately.
"I'm not upset because of what happened, but I beg you to refuse to come to that place anymore" [redacted_name] said gently.
"Sis... I was forced by them" [redacted_name] bowed down silently.
"I will move you to a new school" [redacted_name] said firmly.
